001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.annotations;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.extensions.ApiHookExtension;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.extensions.ApiTestExtension;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.FrameworkAdapter;
006import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
007import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
008import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
009import java.lang.annotation.Target;
010import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtendWith;
011
012/**
013 * Marks a test class as an API test.
014 *
015 * <p>This annotation enables API testing by applying the {@link ApiTestExtension} and
016 * integrating API-related framework functionalities. It ensures that necessary API
017 * configurations, authentication mechanisms, and request handling are properly managed
018 * during test execution.
019 *
020 * <p>Applying this annotation to a test class automatically enables API-specific features
021 * such as API request execution, response validation, and authentication handling.
022 *
023 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
024 */
025@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
026@Target({ElementType.TYPE})
027@FrameworkAdapter(basePackages = {"io.cyborgcode.roa.api"})
028@ExtendWith({ApiTestExtension.class, ApiHookExtension.class})
029@SuppressWarnings("checkstyle:AbbreviationAsWordInName")
030public @interface API {
031
032}
